original_title: The Tale of the Dean's Wife
overview: A group of rebellious students, who practice free love and anarchism, tries to get their conservative dean to give in to their demands. He refuses, but his nymphomaniac wife is willing. Things end in tragedy for some.
tagline: She was voted by the student body The Most Likely To. On or Off Campus! And She Did..! again and again and again!
title: The Tale of the Dean's Wife
